name: sounddeck
description: Sound capturing, buffering, and sound deck for Elgato Stream Deck.

scripts.install: npm run kill-esd && npm run install-plugin
scripts.install-plugin: if not exist %APPDATA%\Elgato\StreamDeck\Plugins\com.geekyeggo.sounddeck.sdPlugin (dotnet publish .\src\SoundDeck.Plugin\ -c Debug -r win10-x64 -restore --no-build --output %APPDATA%\Elgato\StreamDeck\Plugins\com.geekyeggo.sounddeck.sdPlugin\) else (xcopy /e /i /y .\src\SoundDeck.Plugin\bin\Debug\netcoreapp2.2 %APPDATA%\Elgato\StreamDeck\Plugins\com.geekyeggo.sounddeck.sdPlugin\)
scripts.kill-esd: tasklist | find /i "StreamDeck.exe" && taskkill /im StreamDeck.exe /f /t || echo Stream Deck not running

author: Richard Herman
